title: Blazor WASM core hosted : link external login provider to local accounts
body:
I'm developping a blazor webassembly core hosted project, and for the authentications I use the default pattern with IdentityServer and EF.

Now I would like to let the users link their personnal account (google, microsoft,..) in order to add events in their calendar.

To do so I added Google and microsoft external providers.

I followed the doc https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/authentication/social/?view=aspnetcore-3.1&tabs=visual-studio

For google, I can link my account, but I can't gets events in the front-end. I have the following error : System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (Operation is not supported on this platform.) ---> System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Operation is not supported on this platform.\n at System.Net.Sockets.Socket..ctor (System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily addressFamily, System.Net.Sockets.SocketType socketType, System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType protocolType) <0x3a01448 + 0x0003c> in :0 \n at System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener..ctor (System.Net.IPAddress localaddr, System.Int32…horizationBroker.cs:154 \n at Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.GoogleWebAuthorizationBroker.AuthorizeAsync (Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ClientSecrets clientSecrets, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[T] scopes, System.String user, System.Threading.CancellationToken taskCancellationToken, Google.Apis.Util.Store.IDataStore dataStore, Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ICodeReceiver codeReceiver) [0x0004d] in C:\Apiary\2020-08-17.16-07-28\Src\Support\Google.Apis.Auth\OAuth2\GoogleWebAuthorizationBroker.cs:70

For Microsoft, I can't link the account and get the error after setting my microsoft password : {"error":"invalid_request","error_description":"AADSTS90023: Public clients can't send a client secret.}

  • Am I on the good way, in order to only link calendar events and keep the local accounts ?
  • If yes, how can I handle this errors ?

Thank you in advance !
